RumfAdventures: Hello! It is my pleasure to welcome you to the site of my beloved comic strip Rumf Adventures! In the event that you have not become acquainted with my tiny strip,allow me to give you a quick rundown.This is an action-packed adventure strip with a dash of humor.It features a cast of thousands, starring the mighty adventurer Rumfus! That's it.I don't want to spoil the rest for you,just start reading! Onward to Adventures!
Run: You like explosions, tornados, and guns, guns, GUNS!? Look no doggone further!
Runespark: Ever have your house crash-landed on by time-travelling aliens? Ever been put on trial by interdimensional magical princesses? Then you and Li have a lot in common! Pull up a seat and check out RuneSpark, an adventure spanning three worlds. Currently updated Monday-Friday.
RunnersParadox: Runner's Paradox is a 24-Hour Comic drawn at Commuter Comics on 24-Hour Comic Day in 2005. Solid black areas, textures, and color were added later. The comic also includes illustrations by Bryan Wilkinson, Michael Jaecks, Will Jones, and Scott Elyard. This comic, as well as a Paradox Soundtrack CD of original music by Steve Peters, are both available at at www.awakeningcomics.com (our preferred method), or from eBay seller awakeningcomics_dot_com
Running: Heavily based on Mirror's Edge, and is also from notebook. I am 12 years old, so don't freak out if it's bad... but tell me any criticism, I may need it!
RunningOnDew: A shamelessly lewd look at the, often ridiculous, lives of hardcore gamers, Ken and Z. Ken is an assistant manager at GameDepot, while Z is a porn-obsessed computer programmer.
Runningdead: An ignorant country bumpkin named Gary decides to visit his grandmother in Torrent city. But when the city gets overrun with zombies Gary is forced to put personal feeling aside and fight to survive against the running dead
Runningworld: A boy tells his tale of taking a trip down the wrong path, believing he would prove a point to his parents.
Runninwithagun: Kara is a highly skilled assassin who has never missed a shot. But for this latest target something happened; she hesitated, she missed, and she didn't finish the job. Now everybody around her is suffering for her mistake and it's up to her to make things right. Given a second chance will Kara finish the job? Or has she finally found an innocent life, a life that isn't worth destroying. Join Kara the assassin, Nelson her savior, and Thompson her teacher in a crime story told as comic noir.
Rupescomics: this is my first comic In the begining
Rursus: This isn't your average webcomic. It's as if /you/ are the one who controls these characters in this game. This game is called "RURSUS." Weird name, but we could go with it. You can go through the adventures with our heroes and antagonists! So what are you waiting for?
Rustedagate: Az Silverflame, a young boy that had left his past behind him a long time ago, has lived in peace until the memories of his past return and he finds a girl that has an uncanny resemblance to his childhood friend who was supposedly dead.
Rustyandskip: There are two puppies named Rusty and Skip. Rusty is very clever and always thinks of the correct solution whilst Skip is extremely dumb.
Rustyirony: Rusty Irony follows the EPIC adventures of Murdoc the gnome barbarian, Quilliam the drow dancer, and friends as they embark on a quest to bring peace to a war torn land. Some blood shedding carnage and morbid humor, nerdiness, and (lots of) gay sex… so all the good things in life. If you’re not cool with gender non-conforming half-orcs this comic prolly isn’t for you. ONWARD TO GLORY!
Ruthandannabel: Read the entire first chapter on the main site: http://ruthandannabel.com RAARE is a comic about everything that did and didn't happen in high school. The usual: Hanging out, loitering, standing on the sidelines laughing at everything, stupid in-jokes, being on a non-varsity sports team, openly falling asleep in math class, and generally going through life with only the faintest notion that you might someday be older than 18. The unusual: Life in a colonial city that is a magnet for supernatural adventures including but not limited to: seance-ruining ghosts, giant mutated zoo animals, carnivorous apple trees, and non-euclidean vending machines. There's also roller derby girls, violent cheerleaders, sadistic fashion students, and battling yacht clubs just for good measure.
RvJ: A story about a fifteen-year-old boy named Julian Mackintosh, who goes to an all boy's school, auditioned for a school play as a whim for his best friend, Tye, and gets one of the lead roles as Juliet. And to make him even angrier, his ‘Romeo’ is fancy, rich and handsome Rodney Johnson in year 10. Who says they’ll get along?
Rvr: Alexandra Carter lived with only one focus in life, loyalty to her lord and country. Unfortunately for her, other members of her country did not see it that way. Framed for murder and treason, she endured unspeakable tortures and waited for her time to strike. What will she find before the crawling darkness consumes her and the land?
RyanandFriends: A comic about the life of an odd boy and his friends who all live with him in a mansion in Hell. Back stories happen (0-0).
Ryancrow: A story following the steps of a villain.
Ryanthepanther: Ryan the panther is born in Bluepoint city,it is home of one of the worlds biggest and baddest crimes and robberies. When he was six-years old his parents where killed by a gang,Ryan will never live down that day. the police are no help when it comes to crimes all over town,there are a few people on the police force and none of them can stop the crime filled streets of Bluepoint city,ryan decides that he must take the city into his own hands and stop crime himself but before he could do the he then goes to japan to learn from a karate master,6 years later he returns to Bluepoint to fight crime,the story will have it twists and turns in the plot.
RybbieBot: This is the story of RybbieBot 1 and his adventures in Xiana 5
Ryugou: Teo and Kitty set out to find out what happened to Teo's father, but evil looms on the horizon. A tale of adventure, battle and mystery awaits.
SADGothika: This story is about a young girl in highschool who is dealing with Social Anxiety Disorder in 1980's Brookville Virginia.
SASP: 'True, I talk of dreams, Which are the children of an idle brain, Begot of nothing but vain fantasy, Which is as thin of substance as the air And more inconstant than the wind' Sing A Song Prosthetic is set loosely around the space of an unnamed Hospital. Most of us are born in hospital; most of us die in hospital. It seems like a fitting place to set a series that covers birth, death and re-birth. Part abstract, part-dream, part-reality. The story follows a young man who is bought into the hospital after an accident – hinted at suicide – he dies and is resurrected as a wandering spirit. He follows characters in the story and they follow him – especially the older ones who can see him and speak with him at times. He dreams and through his dreams he tries to fight his way back to life and gain a second chance.
SB: Depressing things to darken up your day!
SCIFL: When fungus land finally gets the INTERNET. Things just aren't the same!
SFJ: A simple Choose your own adventure. So suggest things for me to do, and I WILL draw them, usually within the day too.
SH: Akane Maomi is a 15 year old Japanese boy who finds a fascination for the country America, eager to find out more about this place, he stumbles across a boy of a similar age named Ben Roderick. Being fascinated by the fact he actually comes from America to visit his Grandparents, he asks him more and more about the wonderful place of USA. However, Akane’s family doesn’t agree with everything Ben says and doesn’t like the fact he’s associating with the American boy. They go to extremes to hold Akane from Ben, but Akane is determined to stay with Ben. They had already made a pact to be friends forever.
SHANK: shank is a webcomic about a young boy named Luke who's champion father died in the sport called extreme cagefighting . so, to continue his dad's legacy he decides to take up the job for himself and train to become the new world champion. on the way he meets a variety of new friends, including gangsters, hicks, europeans, a nerd, gays and even a clinically insane patient. He plans to accomplish this task no matter what might stand in the way.
SHU: Several nations are training this generation of kids, after years of the cruel possessed animals killing them they finally fought back - hard enough to make the fighting a sport for all to love and enjoy, and fully focus on. Fighting easy creatures and each other like gods, completely peaceful - right? Follow and view and my stuff - Tumblr: ThisIsAnRPS Twitter: ThisIsAnRPS SHU Forum: shuproject.co.nr FB: Kaiser Senpai Wattpad: GayEclipse Deviantart: Kenny1315
SIGHT: A young boy with schizophrenia explores his mental illness into a new world he can never leave from.
SIN: Over a month of interrogation and Adeline Bartola has not spoken a word. Keeping her secrets to herself and no one else. Mysteriously, one day of interrogation Adeline speaks and claims she is ready to tell her story of betrayal and heartache. She will tell her story for four days, she says. No more and no less. Within those four days Adeline will reveal one of the US governments biggest secrets. She will reveal the secrets of a project the government kept hidden for years. A project Adeline only describes as S.I.N.
SL: Sampson Lee is a mailman. He hates his job and the people he works for. He hates his life and his parents. He hates everything in his world. He meets a rabbit who tells him to enter into the old abandoned house at the end of the road. He realizes the house is haunted and tries to leave. However, previous owner of the house (deseased) forbids him to leave the house and forces Sampson to work for him.
SMR: Semi slice of life in the life of Cherry. Living a double life she longs to abandon her secret life as a ninja assassin and live a normal life. With help from her friends on both sides she copes with issues in both sides of this coin.
SOG: The adventures of two stickmen, who are both grey, but not equally intelligent.
SOTF: Secrets of the forest or SOTF is a comic about John a human who lives in a secret society of chimera (A human subspecies who have abilities of animals ) who live in the forest. Where he learns the ways of the clan and the ways of the warrior. All while an unknown evil threatens the forest. See more content and comics early @ http://secrets-of-the-forest.tk/
Sabercow: Several guys enter the world of the internet (insert crazy ass insanity here)
Saboru: Short video game or anime themed stories that I don't know what to do with go here. Generally light-hearted, but I might try some dark stuff later on. Updated infrequently... because I'm not clever or productive enough.
Saccharinevampirl: Saccharine Vampirl is a soap opera about vampires who pretend they're not. Alright, it's also about witches, talking dolls, little girls that talk to animals, demons, Death's sister, dead people that don't stay dead, and much weirdness hiding under the guise of normal life.
Sacredtruth: A vampire hunting vampires with a priest.. sorta.
Sadieisdead: Sadie is dead, to begin with. In technical terms she is undead, but dead is dead. Though in a rather convenient turn of events she finds herself resurrected in a town full of monsters and other inhuman creatures. She's taken in by the Hayden Academy for Extraordinary Youth and, on top of trying to recover her memory, she is now stuck having to deal with cliques she never even imagined. Things are pretty lively for someone so dead.
Safetypatrol: A semi-action, semi-romantic (not BL) story of a boy named Lan who joins a club who's motives are to keep order in the school. Even if that means fighting in the halls every day.
Safranine: Safranine is about maneating mermaids that lure women into the sea.
SailorMoonTheEnemyNextDoor: This is a fan manga inspired, written, and drawn by the original author of Sailor Moon: Ms. Naoko Takeuchi. Karolina Romanska and John Smith do not wish in any way to claim, usurp, or abuse property rights of Ms Naoko Takeuchi and the other authors of images used in this fan-based manga. This is a NON-PROFIT project, done strictly in our leisure time for sheer enjoyment.
SaintCrescent: Elafya, the one great kingdom created by almighty Gods is under the crisis. This kingdom was once ruled by three of the most powerful races: Humans, Elves and Demons. But as the time went by, jealousy and animosity started to take a control of humans weak minds. Malevolent atmosphere grew as a greatest war between the races, making them fall apart from each other... Now, over 20 years after the incidence, many demons are ready to start over and live again peacefully with humans. But some of those have come back to seek the revenge for the human king, who chased them away from their home so many years ago. And these people aren´t going to rest until they manage to have his head. And his inheritors´ too... And so the desperate people of Elafya have no other choice than hide their king Warren, and his son prince Fenris. But someday they need to face the ghosts from their past...
Saintcanis: Pixie Canis-Leo, a bear-dog, needs to save a young unicorn named Beryl from the clutches of the dragon Captorops. Captorops is bent on killing all the unicorns on Chalopaz (Venus to you Earthlings) and claim dominion of Chalopaz and it's colony Imán (planet Earth)!
Sairaus: they've drove each other mad into sickness, their frail bodies still trying to accomplish many things.
SakuraBomb: Prepare yourselves. Steel your minds. Hold on tight. ANIMU RANDOM WTF MEMEPALOOZA POWERRRR. Oh, heck, I don't know what to write here. It's a spontaneous-as-all-getout webcomic with a dash of lol. Just go read it and see what I mean. xD
SakuraDAY: Follow the adventures of Meija as she begins a second chance in life after a fatal accident. She finds truth, love, friendship, trials, self-revelation, and PURPOSE. P.S. The comic is read the traditional manga-style: right-to-left. UPDATES WEEKLY {Saturday || Sunday} Merci Beaucoup. Enjoy!
Sakurasaku: My first comic about my experiences as a grad student in Japan
Saladtongues: I leave it entirely in the audience's hands to determine what I am doing. I may be a part of the audience, but I will withhold my judgments until I have heard those of others. In this way, I hope to remove author bias from your determination. The cannon of this work exists wholly within each 746x371 pixel installment. All other information is simply gaudy decoration to ease the author's interface with the distribution technology and sooth his sense of aesthetics.
Salakay: The origin of a vigilante known as SALAKAY... a hero or a menace? This is the story of a man born with unusual gift. But being part-human, part-monster... it has become a curse to him. He was raised in the wilds and possesses preternatural senses, strength, speed and agility with the ability to form retractable spurs/spikes from his elbows.
Salem: Salem Massachusetts: while historically it hasn't done much to help the case of Supernatural residents, maybe this tiger CAN change its stripes- for the right reasons. A werewolf, a vampire, a zombie and a mage learn the true meaning of 'fighting fire with fire' and that not everything is immediately as it seems. Especially not in Salem. --updates Tuesdays, Thursdays and Saturdays--
Salindra: Mengisahkan Salindra, seorang putera raja dari sebuah kerajaan kecil yang bernama Alurin Sari. Datang ke Al Kutb sebuah pusat pendidikan termasyhur yang menempatkan putera-putera raja untuk dididik tentang ilmu ketatanegaraan dan magis demi menjadi raja yang berwibawa apabila mereka pulang ke negara mereka. Anak-anak raja ini kebanyakannya berasal dari negara-negara yang bernaung di bawah Majlis Panji, sebuah pertubuhan negara-negara timur yang kukuh dan berpengaruh. Kisah ini merangkumi dunia pendidikan kepimpinan, pertarungan fizikal dan magis antara benua dan negara, melibatkan unsur spiritual dan mitos(jin), percintaan dan pengembaraan.
Salisburyhero: Salisbury Hero is a "choose your action" comic where you can choose where to lead Salisbury on his adventure. To navigate, use the drop-down box to choose the page number corresponding with the choice you make. If there is no choice at the end of the page, go to the next page to continue reading the story. There are multiple endings, some good some bad, so try to get the ultimate ending!
Salivadreams: badly illustrated blog comic with even badlier jokes and the badliest spelling.
Salvage: Hannah is the main character, her and the captain of this space ship Tailor salvage old ship recks and retrive the cargo etc. They stopped at a planet to refuel and re stock etc for their current salvage misson. well when they set off the main computer detects a sto away, a girl named Kim. They are too far now from any planet and they stuck with her, at first Kim and Hannah don't get along but after a while they start to discover feelings
Salvaged: What is a man to do after the apocalypse? Rebuild, reorganize, repopulate? Or just lay back and be the self proclaimed king of what's left of humanity. If no one objects of course.
Samandcharley: Updates - every weekend! A couple of random adventures, thoughts, and other nonsense featuring my two furbabes - Sammy, the Dachshund, & Charley, the Chi/Corgi mix. **Strictly for shits n' giggles. (;
Samandmunki: A cartoony comic made by a teenage boy with mediocre skills and a bunch of ideas.
Samandroger: Meet Sam Hicks: A 29-year-old Christian male and Roger's best friend. Known in the series as a douchebag, but also on most occasions acts as the voice of reason. Not much is said about his job, but he might work in a automobile factory. He also has a side job as a freelance artist. Sam has few enemies, but one being a neighborhood 10-year-old kid by the name of Scoot. Debbie seems to have a crush on Sam, but he's totally oblivious to that fact. He's also at odds with Gerald on occasion. Sam is a churchgoer and good friends with Pastor Murphy. Sam enjoys sweet tea, sarcasm and anything that annoys Roger. Meet Roger Morrison: Roger is a 28-year-old Christian male who has lived in Wondervalley, South Carolina all his life. He's currently apartment roommates with his best friend, Sam and his beloved cat, Spoons. Roger teaches 9th Grade English at Wondervalley High. Known as a goofball and a self-proclaimed moron, Roger gets into all kinds of hilarious messes in his daily life. Sam usually bails him out of his predicaments however. Roger is very much in love with Debbie Dearheart, but she seems to be more interested in Sam, to Roger's dismay. Roger is also a churchgoer and friends with Pastor Murphy, though Roger gets easily distracted. Roger's favorite TV show is The Seven Foot Ninja. Roger also has an arch nemesis by the name of Gerald Thompson. Roger is proud to live in the Southern United States and is passionate about teaching the youth, even though at times, he needs to learn life lessons himself. Roger also enjoys writing poetry and stories. Sam & Roger have known each other their entire lives and are more so like brothers than best friends. Series by: Dwayne Eric McLeod
Samba: What if your family really was a bunch of thieves (and not just because the neighbors say so)? Not just any den of bandits, but the royal family of theft? Imagine if Lupin the 3rd and Carmen Sandiego got married and had a child. Upon growing older, the girl discovers the truth about her parents and decides to complete their legacy while beginning her own legend.
Sambaartcomics: a collection of short stories I'm working on :)
Samsaravortex: The world within a world. In the story, we discover the truth behind the existence of a boy in a time-forgotten world, that is more familiar than you imagine.
Samthedragon: A super sweet dragon? A naughty unicorn? Can I make this entire description all questions? Sam the Dragon is a comic strip about the lives of three cute fantasy characters (and a goldfish) who escaped to our world after being betrayed in theirs. We have Sam, who is a sweet but naive little dragon. He tries his best to avoid confrontation, but will stand up for what he believes in. He loves making friends with everyone, including the wildlife he finds in and around the house. Corny the Unicorn is Sam's best friend and is usually at the root of the trouble that is currently being hatched. He has a much more opportunistic outlook on life, with a knack at finding their guardian, Ms. Flutterby's, last nerve. He loves to fantasize about being a great hero or a legendary warrior, mostly because he craves power and fame. Zen is Sam's goldfish, who spends most of his day contemplating the many philosophical questions in life. His interaction with the members of his household usually results in a perspective altering experience. Ms. Flutterby is the fairy in charge of this wacky house full of misfits. She does her best to keep a tight ship, but the waters of disaster are constantly crashing over their idyllic lives. As the primary source of discipline, she works overtime as both teacher and homemaker to keep these two little fantasy creatures firmly grounded in reality.
Samtheseries: Evil is born and one reluctant hero must stop it. What will happen in this exciting story full of conflict, passion, and action!
Samualsdream: samual was cast out of the vampier clan after betraying his freind artwork by midnight script by grant r
SamuraiChamplooEdoJapan3Point5: So... yeah. I recently went on an archive binge on Wands & Warts (found here: http://darthsanddroids.net/wandsandwarts/episodes/0050.html). If you know what I'm talkin about, then you probably know what's coming up. I decided to give RPG screencap a shot and here's what I came up with: Samurai Champloo if it were a roleplaying campaign. :p
SamuraiCuties: Samurai cuties is like a Otomo game in comic form, I will let the readers vote on which guy's route the main girl Aya will go down. This story is about Aya Harada a girl whose world is turned upside down when she is taken in by samurais who turn out to be bounty hunters/ Monster hunters. They fight demons, exorcise ghosts, or they help them it all depends on the situation they are. So who will Aya end up with out of the four handsome men, Ko, Haruka, Takashi, or Hiro.? The choice is yours. I'am going to update this every tuesday or wednesday : ) There is now also a tumblr page for the cutie pies ~ http://samuraicuties.tumblr.com/
Samuraifrog: A randomly published webcomic by Sean Taylor and Sarah White. They're busy folks, so this comes out when they have time. It's like cowboys, samurai, frogs and bugs. And horses named Wishes. And bad puns and jokes.
Samwisespadeforhire: All towns have their seedy underbellies, those places where danger's only as far as the business end of the nearest hidden weapon. Even magical towns in worlds populated by elves, dwarves, little folk, knights and unicorns as it turns out. It takes a hard-boiled private eye to deal with the surrealities of the place. Wherever dangerous dames and nasty knights rear their heads in Knave's End, there's one hard-boiled halfling who'll take the case... Samwise Spade: For hire!
Sanctaterra: Sixty years ago, in response a catastrophe that left the entire planet devastated, the city of Kalapor had sealed itself off from the steadily-spreading shockwave. A company called EpiCorp arose in the wake of the disaster and eventually became more powerful than most people even realize. And after learning about some of EpiCorp's darkest secrets, a band of unlikely heroes sets out to stop them.
Sanction: Supernatural Misadventures of Private Investigator Matt Loner
Sanctuary: Flights of fantasy through Alternate worlds.
Sandboxdrama: Lone green girl in the middle of a endless desert. She doesn't remember her past, but a friendly hulking bear wants to help her. You wouldn't believe the amount of Drama in a Sandbox.
Sandboxdramastrips: Sandbox Drama strips and everything else loosely related. (I also post all Sandbox Drama fan art here)
Sandviches: Who is Fortinski..you ask? Well..he's just a normal everyday employee of Starlight.INC. Pssh..normal? With him around..I am very certain nothing is normal
Sanguine: Welcome to "The Chalice". A weekly deathmatch event that is watched by the Prodromus, the most powerful alien race ever encountered. There they pit Humankind and other species in captivity among themselves for their own amusement. That was, Until Eve was born...
Sanitythiefcomic: Stone Avery arrives to work one day, to find an envelope marked "Confidential" on his desk, an alias, hiding the mission that will turn his life from lowly to insane. Summer Only: Sanity Thief Webcomic will be updating Sunday, Tuesday and Thursday!
Sans: My latest project, a furry comic about revenge and secret agents and stuff I don't know. Updates randomly, although you can hope, desperately hope for a page every week.
Sarakleeyo: A World of Warcraft themed web comic starring the Argent Crusade's unusual misfits. The crusade allowed heroes of the Alliance and Horde to become partners. Sara & Kleeyo set the example...provided they can survive their friendship. Updated Mondays.
Sarmanian1342: Sarmanian, 13:41 is a series focusing on the two helicopter crewmen Valery and Dmitri and their Mi-24, Olga 3. They are sent out on a standard mission to the city of Sarmanian where an important checkpoint has been controlled my the rebel militia. Based upon the Sarmania shorts by Alexander Lewandowski. Story and characters © Alexander Lewandowski Art © Sophie Sessions
Sassycauldron: Poorly drawn comic about a maniacal yet hapless wizard and his back-talking cauldron, along with others. The jokes are lame and don't make sense, and a dog can create better artwork. In fact, your family pet can draw better than this.
Satanplayground: an everlasting struggle between a dead man the personification of satan.
Satanslittlehelper: meet aveda, to mortals, a model teen, to demons,a nuisance. follow aveda and her somewhat freaky siblings as they travel the path to royalty, with a little help from dad and friends.
Satellite: Three souls struggle to not only exist, but to thrive in a universe filled with trials and tribulations at every turn.
Satoodle: I've been having a horrendous time keeping up with my actual comic, Hot Chocolae Through a Straw, thanks to the frustration of not being able to find my own personal style that won't make me cringe. My goal is, with the help of my OCs (Original Characters), to discover the art style that works for not only me, but for those who I decide to show my work to. tl;dr: This is a place where I'm going to be putting all of my doodles and sketches so that I learn a better drawing technique. I'm hoping I can find a way that it can be a little fun for those who care to take a look at the doodles posted here. Maybe take requests for different pictures for my OCs or something. We'll see.
Saturdaynights: Two friends play a popular tabletop game, and invite two new players, that have never played before, to their Saturday Night game.
Sauronnies: Sauronnies are... Well, Sauronnies! Short stories about the most famous Dark Overlord!
SavannaTown: I'm not sure where this going but your welcome to walk down the path with me. It will be funny or it won't hold my interest (or anyone else's.)
Savemegebus: Gebus considers himself the True Saviour of Humanity, though he rarely does anything about that. The comic revolves around him and his adventures which are often written as multiple-strip fabricated stories in order to explain changes in Gebus' appearance. As a comic straight out of the minds of the authors with little or no forethought, what plot or general continuity there is exists largely as an excuse for the authors to keep making comic strips. The fourth wall is broken regularly, and characters are taken directly from the authors' real life, though the storylines are not. The comic's style is taken from the comic it was spun from, Pixel-Sapiens, which features blocky characters with little to no curves or movement, and simple or absent backgrounds.
Savingsammie: First story in a anthology of short stories based on real life events involving dog owners and how they came to adopt their pets.
Saviorjdera: year 2558: After many human losses in the first contact with aliens humans simply call drones,even escape shuttles couldn't get through the massive fleet composed by the new threat to the still divided people of earth. 12 year old Isiic Johnston aboard the transport "LIBERTY" accompanied by his father is the main protagonist. This webcomic will follow him on his many adventures across the galaxy
Saviorsofbacon: You don't get to know anything about this mofos.
Saviourmachine: Saviour Machine is an independently published comic available in digital and print format. It follows the journey of two brothers and a mysterious girl named Jane Doe as they seek out the source that is pulling them west across the United States. The book is three parts action, drama and cheap laughs. The elevator pitch is “Abbot and Costello meets Tarantino”. Saviour Machine is recommended for mature readers.
Sawbladersblacknuzlocke: *SADLY, THIS COMIC HAS BEEN ABANDONED. NO FURTHER UPDATES ARE BEING MADE TO THIS RUN.* A hand-drawn Nuzlocke comic detailing one crazy adventure in Pokemon: Black Version! Trust me, the art gets better as it goes along! Original Thread on the Offical Nuzlocke Forums: http://s7.zetaboards.com/Nuzlocke_Forum/topic/8520848/

Sawscratched: Jigsaw is continuing his work despite his death. The FBI are trying to desperately find any lead that could reveal the identity of this new Jigsaw. Meanwhile the people in Jigsaw's new test are struggling to survive as well as find how they are linked as well.
Scalpelsandpicks: An aspiring rocker, his band, a doctor, and her best friend attempt to achieve their goals.
Scarecrobotic: A Scarecrow goes to the City.
Scarlet: I wonder if it will ever matter, has there ever been any meaning in life. Contemplating,wandering the wastes, bearing the sins of our forefathers, years have past and yet what remains, dust and echoes of humankind's former glory. Scarlet....that is my name I dont care where I come from or where I will be going..but..I shall remain...on this rock, this forsaken rock...a place known as earth.
Scarred: The adventures of a cursed princess, and her companions, on their journey to restore peace to the kingdom.
Scarsincluded: This is going to be my first attempt at doing on of these, and i hope you like it...im relativley new to drawing so, any feed back good and bad would be greatly appreciated!
Scatspackler: Synths in Fifths. A directed reverie.
Scatter3020: It's the year 3020, the world has gone to shit, but amongst the wastelands and fallout, there is still hope.. er, life. dumb kids, time bubbles, and zombies. More so comedy than anything. This is Scatter, short for scatter-brained-leftovers-of-the-world yes, this promises to be eccentric if nothing else.
Scatteredleaves: Running from a home visited by misfortune one too many times, Ana finds that the only other place she can turn to is the nearby home of a family of Sprites. She's heard of how the Sprites can give you anything you want as long as you give them something valuable in return, but she's also heard many tales of trades gone wrong. In desperation, Ana decides to take her chances with the Sprites, making a blind leap into a world of swirling fog and bent truths. (updates Fridays)
ScenesFromBLANK: Scenes From [BLANK] can be scenes from a book, movie etc. but they are all real!
Scgfans: The Super Chibi Girl webcomic fans are amazing and have sent in a lot of fan art! I've also made some SCG-related art that has nothing to do with the main story. Things like that go here to allow comments on the art.
Schisthappens: The tale of Zasit the dwarf and other friends, plauged by the death and horror that is dwarf fortress.
Schizmatic: Schizmatic is a webcomic based on blueprint schematics applied to actual life. It puts the cosmos under a microscope, and reality under analysis.
Schizochu: Join us in Prannke-ville for the true and honest adventures of Schizochu, the electric hedgehog pokemon with Schizophrenia!
Schlap: Schlap! It's all you need to know!
SchoolOfBitches: Whilst whats left of the world struggles to come to terms with the devastation left in the wake of an unknown global catastrophe, referred to as The Event, a collective of old friends seemingly bound by fate to reunite, make one last desperate stand to save mankind from extinction. This book of Genesis... is the story of how the world ends.
SchoolofViolence: The story tells about a delinquent who stumbles upon a Fighting School called Chrono High. Now a student at this School; His only Goal is beating and taking the top from the best of the best. What crazy adventures await our hero in this Abnormal School?
Schoolofsecrets: Red Cross High School is a solid-looking school. On the outside. On the inside, it’s erupting with all sorts of kids who can’t manage to stay in school for more than one class a day. Teachers and students both make the vaguest, lamest excuses to rush out of class at all times of the day. EVERYDAY. Why? Because, as Cherry seems to be discovering, everyone- from the janitor to the class nerd to the math teachers- is hiding something.
Schoolowned: Those epic moments when someone particularly stupid gets PONED in school.
Schrodinger2k: This is something awesome. Yes it is. De De De. Something Awesome by far.
Schrodingerstraveler: Literally blown out of time, one man explores the infinite multiverse. For science. And possibly changes the world one horrible mistake at a time. Oops.
Sciencesorceryandsnark: Violet, like a few other unfortunate princesses, hasn't been outside very much in the last twenty years. The dragon, the river of lava and the monster infestation in the castle she's in hasn't exactly helped mattered on that front. Finally rescue is on its way and this knight has even managed to get through the ward. But this knight is, well, not exactly what Violet was expecting her True Love to be. Nor did she expect her rescuer to be tethered by the very heart to possibly the most cynical unicorn out there. Not exactly the most well adjusted pair to help her acclimatise to the world outside. With its big, terrifying open spaces, the crowds, the creatures and the tiny matter of the army that has over ran her kingdom. Why exactly did she leave the tower again?
Scissors: Scissors is the story about a man who got blown up overseas while serving his country only to lose his arms. He came back handicapped, but due to a robbery, he knew that he was still useful in fighting on American soil. Now, he is a mysterious vigilante they call "Scissors" who has prosthetic arms with blades blades attached to them. Known somewhat as a kind of Robbin Hood, he takes from the wretched, and gives to the weak. He has made several enemies, even the hard faced Detective Roscum.
Scistar: An anthology of a few different comic ideas I've had! Chapters are all different stories featuring different characters and settings!
Scoundrels: "Scoundrels" is a collaborative comics project featuring stories from all corners of a dangerous futuristic world. Updates every Monday and Friday!
Scourgecomic: SCOURGE is yet another Zombie Apocalypse based comic, but this one has Furries in it. It takes place in, around, and near Natika and various other parts of Russia. That is why street signs, building logos and other types of public wordery is in Cyrillic, and since most English speaking people don't know how to read Cyrillic, i will provide translations. Since the world is "suppose" to end in 2012, this might end up being a survival manual/stuff to read between waves of the undead. The genre may consist of Action/Adventure, Drama, Romance, slight Comedy or most likely a mixture of those four. Updates on Monday.
ScramArtist: "Scram Artist" is the epic story of two men and their quest to teach the world common sense, sarcasm, and an utter disregard for other people and their "feelings."
Scrapper: .:Welcome to the world tournament of $CRAPPER!:. What is "$crapper" you ask? Well well! Aren't you a n00b to this! I'll be nice and explain! $crapper: Kills=popularity! That's right kiddies, the more you kill, the more you become famous! Who am I? Well, I'm just your friendly host "X-Treme"! Will you watch? or will you join?
Scraps: Random scraps of paper are the most likely place for me to put a scrap of a drawing. This is where I put those scraps.
ScratchProof: In an anachronistic universe, where science meets sorcery and elves meet cigarettes (?), Nikolan has been given the task of warding away colossal predators and the occasional genocidal faction away from the 'civilized' ever since he could barely hold a blade. He isn't considered professional in his field but with the team of his own consisting of a mysteriously talented Dr. Eight and a mad-mannered elf nicknamed Axe, they get to share the blame equally for any job botched. Sure the work hours are irregular, the pay is laughably meager and most of the effort includes unhealthy doses of running for your life and relying on your luck but at least it would make one heck of a dinner-party story to tell. Updates Mondays and Fridays.
Scratchmen: The adventure of a young girl who can see invisible monsters and must come to realize how human they really are.
ScreamForYourLife: Kipper just moved into his new house, well, more like an old mansion. He thinks he was drawn to it because it has potential...a potential murder... What's that screaming noise? Do you hear it?
Screamingwoods: A comic based on the events, locations, and pets of the virtual pet site "PetRPG".
Screwup: Watch as this never gets updated!
Scrib: One day, something happened. And from that day forward, more things happened. This is the tale of those things.
Scribble: A young graffiti artist finds out that he has a rival. What happens when he confronts them?
Scribblercomics: john and bradley, who are roommates, try to survive the funny stuff that happenes to them
ScriptureAccordingtoTomGould: A series riddled with tomfoolery of Biblical proportions, "Scripture According to Tom Gould" is a humorous take on many of your favorite Bible passages.
Scrubdiving: It's a comic about scuba diving. And cyborgs. The color/shading will be rough until I figure Manga Studio out.
ScrubumLudum: Scrubum is set in a world I adopted from a friend's comic, set in a vaguely fantasy game-world following two guard NPCs as they wander through life, making jokes and screwing up. Plus a bunch of other characters of varying importance. Tuesday for updates, plus any other time.
Scurvy: all aboard the uss bronco... the most fucktarded ship in the united states navy. Join the crew of half assed dimwits as they summon demons by accident get stomped on by tyranous cheifs and run around in mass confusion during drills. Surviving on this ship ain't no cookout
Scx: The whackjob Terrans, the mindless Zergs and the irate Protoss have NOT found each other at war... Instead they have found themselves in several humurous adventures waiting to be seen by webcomic viewers. Enjoy!
Scybat: An adventurer finds himself having traded places with one of the monsters in the cave he was exploring. From here he must evade adventurers 'mistaking' him as one of the monsters, outwit mad scientists, and figure out just how to open jars without opposable thumbs.
Seaglass: A seaside cook's only desire is to pull his inherited, half rotted beach house up and out of danger of crumbling into the ocean. Enter a dark eyed stranger who makes an offer that is hard for the cook to turn down...
Sealedimmortals: A story line of different story lines that all lead up to the same thing, the releasing of the Sealed Immortals.
Seamonsters: Congratulations! You are now the proud owner of a sea monster. This guide will help you care for your new pet and prevent you from inadvertently becoming a sea monster meal.
Seananddanny: Sean and Danny are 7th graders who get into odd situations with lots of weird stuff.
Searchforspheres: In a distant world full of powerless(AKA Dead) robots, one living bot takes it upon himself to restore every robot using a magical power source called a sphere. The only problem is... spheres are very hard to find.
Searching: Life is a novella for some and a party for others. Sometimes it's a downright tragedy.
Seasontwo: The follies of three fictional NFL players.
Seatofwrath: Blice and his band of bane hunters will hunt down any monster, as long as the price is right. But what happens when they are called to do the impossible? Join this intrepid squad as they try to do just that. So this is a comic I tried awhile ago. Wanted to put it up here since the new comic will have some of the same characters in it.
SecondChances: Some people say that everyone deserves a second chance at life. But what if you never wanted a second chance? What if you only wanted that one shot, and have it be over? What if you were forced to take that second chance anyway? This is the story of such a person, a young woman cut down in her prime, and forced to try again.
Seconds: All the comics here are primarily made in [i]Second Life[/i] and other virtual worlds, using crews of avatars to pose for and shoot the images used in each panel. It follows different stories with different characters over time. The initial story, [i]Return to Second Life[/i], is about what happens when avatars meet their owner in-world. General schedule is one page a day when reprinting , and about one page every two days when in production.
SecretSleep: When a young man wakes up in a dumpster in a place he's never been before, can he find his way back home before it all goes to hell?
Secretagent: Secret Agent Biff Thrash of British Intelligence takes on Nazi clones, dwarf assassins and evil vampires.
Secretagent2: Special Agent Biff Thrash returns in a new adventure, taking on old foes and new. This man is dangerous!
Section3: Intro to I.C.E. Ops (International Clandestine & Espionage Operations) When the forces of terror and evil threaten the free world, it is up to the world's greatest warriors to defend it. A team of the absolute best and brightest. Highly trained. Dedicated. Loyal. Deadly. This team does not exist... Really, it doesn't. Due to budget problems, all we've got is Section 3. We're all SCREWED.
SeeYourFeels: Comic is storyline-less, jump in anytime and hit the "random" button! Update Schedule: Every business day (Monday through Friday, excluding holidays) www.facebook.com/ICanSeeYourFeels
Seed: Raised in a land where magic is as common as breathing and where natural wonders abound, Dominique has always known that she was different. Longing to know more about who she really is, Dominique travels to the city of Celastin where she believes she can find the answers that she seeks. Unbeknownst to her, magic is strictly forbidden in this mighty city, a fact that will soon lead Dominique into great danger, new friends and onto an adventure that will span this vast and fantastical world. - Description written by Orian Johnson (Editor for Seed)
Seeingdoublewc: Seeing Double follows the history of one of the most evil creatures known. Infected as a kit by the Dark Seed, as he grows, even the simplest things because a struggle for power with the Darkness in his mind. The Darkness wants to control the universe, and with it's host, it plans to do just that. And in the end, it all boils down to one question: How do you fight the greatest threat known to the universe if that threat is...yourself?
Seekingacceptance: Acceptance is a young man just trying to survive in life.
Seenoevil: There are people all across the world with subtle superpowers – just most of them suppress them in fear. How often is a child reprimanded for talking to an imaginary friend? What if that imaginary friend is real – and can be perceived by those open-minded enough to do so? Ghosts, demons, angels, fairies, whatever you call them – they are real to people who believe they are. And those people who believe they can do extraordinary things become powerful.
Seeya: Random comics from the Strip Generator.
Segments: A young man decides to start using a power of his to change the whole world. But is he really entitled to judge anyone? Is he able to handle the revolution he set off?
Sei: Words and images that inspire living and contemplation, action and thought. All images are from the web. Words are from song lyrics, cliches, lists, books.
Seikausagi: After countless wars on Earth there came a time of peace. However the peace was settled after billions lives were lost, billions of homes were destroyed and the land lay in ash. Not all hope was lost. Japan had created homes called "Space Basses" on all of the planets surrounding Earth.Most of the survivors left Earth. Most who stayed on Earth were criminals, those who weren't,were forced to join gangs. All seemed well until a new War arose. However it wasn't a war among the humans. A new threat arose from the depth of space. To save the lives of the children large boarding schools were built on Earth the only planet with a barrier that could protect from the attacks. All of the children were sent to Earth to train and become soldiers in the war... The time of Peace had ended now the human race may be facing extinction.
Seki: On a rock near a star, society has become social media. Blurbs, phrases and single images became their language and tales became no more. Memes, and tweets, and 120 characters of b*&6 sh$@. THIS IS PLANET EARTH: THE LAND WITH NO STORIES. Art by Mike Fallek. Lettering by casey drogin.
Self: Its a mon type series, you know like battles between creatures.. Stuff like that :p
Sellyoursoul: Is it really fair to destroy one species to better another? Can murder be acquitted if it aids somebody? These are the questions that Sandstorm and Thunder desire to answer when they depart from their southern tundra abodes and haunts to figure out just what is “right” and what is “wrong”. The duo delves into the northwest arctic, a place where many small carnivorous species feel segregated and used for reasons beyond understanding of the simplistic mind. But in reality, there are two sides of the coin, and thus two sides of the story.
Semblanceofsanity: (Reads right to left like traditional manga.) Nuclear annihilation has devastated the earth. What species still cling to life are subjected daily to starvation, dehydration, tornadoes, and radioactive fallout. Humanity is but a fleeting memory, only remembered by those who managed to endure both the blast and its aftermath. Their only hope of salvation lies in reaching what remains of civilization, which could very well be thousands of miles away, if it exists at all. And so the race for survival begins…
Semperux: The life of a Marine wife. Geared towards those with families to look after. Ux is latin for wife.
Sempervirent: A fictionalized account of the non-fiction that is life. Specifically, my and my friends' college years in a secluded school with other vivid and magical people. We battle our fears and shortcomings as we navigate the journey of fresh independence. Friends and foes will be had, feasts shared, and adventures ventured upon. Come along with us for the ride. All illustration is pen and ink line work on Bristol paper, and then colored in The GIMP.
Sempiternal: Lucius Diedrich never wished to be immortal, it just happened.
Sennsunngeta: This comic is dedicated to the old school. Sennsunngeta is a high sci-fi action fantasy mini series. It focuses on 3 college kids name Ronnie, Shar, and Trifina. All who are trying to break into the music industry. But their lives are turned completely upside down when a mysterious dark force and a wandering modern day samurai wielding a mysterious red sword arrives in their fare city. The entire comic is drawn with nothing but Color Pencils. (Yep!) The comic will start off as a 4 part arc with pages posted every Friday starting in January. This comic is inspired by my favorite movie "The Lord of the Rings"
Sensemotive: The ups, the downs, and the in-between of my Pathfinder group's experience through the campaign: Rise of the Runelords.
Sentinelsofbloodisland: Jake Thompson is a famous explorer whose writing is featured in books and his adventures on television. He has just married his long time girlfriend, Mary and has signed a great book deal about the cursed, Blood Island. The publisher needs a rough draft quick, so they're picking up the tab on the honeymoon and the research!
Serengetti: Serengetti Dreams, as you may have inferred from the title, is a webcomic by Shane Itram. It updates daily, Monday through Friday. First time here? Kind of lost? Check out Dr. Bolton's welcome to new readers!
Serexium: This is a webcomic. I know, you're surprised.
Serpamiaflare: Seeking meaning in a series of strange dreams involving her mother who died years ago, Kylie journeys to Raswen to find Madame Zinala, a fortune teller who has been known to interpret dreams with great accuracy. On the way, she meets Cain, a seemingly hapless cleric who, coincidentally, is also trying to meet Madame Zinala in hopes of learning how to break the curse of chains on his body. Together, they reach Raswen and go to find Madame Zinala. Unfortunately, their timing couldn't be worse...
SerpentsofOld: Beware Beware the Great Black Wall, Within the forest standing tall; Within it's borders all must dread The clever beasts disguised as men.
Servant: Born of gods and raised by mortals, young Gal Ang/Gabriel Barreon lives as an ordinary student, working part-time as a call center representative. Yet when the need arises, he dedicates his divine power as a Bathala ("god") to serving the cause of justice and the protection of mankind as Servant! But even with the power of the cosmos in his hands, can he make the right choices to protect humanity from its own follies? Updates on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday!
ServerCat: A comic about me and my friends, and our adventures on our server. The main star is a Neko who is the embodiment of the server and stuff. Or something else equally gay. Expect a lot of stupid jokes and bad development. The art itself is not much better than the content.
SethandFrank: In The Crazy World of Seth and Frank, nothing could go wrong. Except for the fact that Seth has to have a mind of a complete weirdo who comes up with the strangest ideas to carry out.
Settleandmermie: A talking cat and dog make poop jokes. The humor hinges around strong language, so be advised.
Seven7vii: Seven7VII follows the story of two young men: Sor and Ae'd. Together, they try to stop the Seven Ruling Lords of Hell and their demonic army from opening a portal to our world. Using demonic souls and the "Seven Sins" as weapons to battle against the forces of Hell.
SevenSecs: Kaleb is a 20-year-old (although he doesn't look it) office guy, he works in a cubical all day which sometimes drives him insane. He's been single for nearly a whole 6 months. There's a good reason too... ...all his 'partners' end up dying. This contains Yaoi
Sevenflavors: Anki and her friends are a group of monks. They've put their entire lives into protecting the village that their monastery overlooks and the country around it, but what happens when that's taken away from them? Updates on Wednesdays (and occasionally other days too). Written and drawn by me, co-imagined by Mikey Witts.
Sevenpack: Keiran Midorian is a high school teenager, but he discovers that he has the gift of magic! His friends also discover their own abilities with time. Thing kind of lead towards fighting demons and saving the world. The joke is... Keiran DOESN'T want to do this!
Sevenstars: join me,nicksta,bk,and my other freind on our search for the seven stars!
Seventhsense: when maki naski's parent's are lost at sea maki naski must live with his ugly old uncle and aunt. then a big detective case comes up and he runs away from home. he calls one of the best in the buisness agent five. the man takes maki to tokyo japan where he is attacked by some of jimmy drake's,bad guy in the big case, evil minions. then maki attacks with a mighty blow and knocks him out but where is agent five?
SevenyearLimbo: A coming of age story that follows two teenagers, Nick and Jason, throughout their teenage years and into adulthood. This is a story that kids and adults of all ages can relate to. This is the story of life. This is sevenyearLimbo.
Sexgazer: A webcomic with naked girls, sex gadgets... wild cheerleaders and evil nerds. Updates the saturdays, follow and see the art of sexgazer in sexgazer.tumblr.com
Sfp: SFP is a minimalist attempt at the existential exploration into broader themes such as life, love, and pornography which primarily uses stick figures.
Shades: A WW2 fighter pilot, a First Century warrior queen and a prehistoric mystic. Oh, and their tailor. These are not your common-or-garden heroes!
Shadesofgrey: Shades of Grey follows the story of Jackal, a survivor in a post nuclear wasteland, as he struggles to survive. The survivor's colony known as Lionheart has been undr constant attack by mutants and raiders, and now only Jackal can put a stop to it.
Shadesoflantim: When Abi is kidnapped from her world and forced to take place in a strange contest, she finds herself travelling across space and time in an effort to win the tournament and find her way home.
Shadetreehero: Small time hero's in a small town but with big time adventures.
ShadowForce: Two corporate suits form a "super hero" team to defend their company from monsters, madmen and global terrorism.
ShadowRealm: Meet Lacie, your average outcast who hates large crowds of people, minus the fact she cant recall the first 15 years of her life and that she has a mysterious ring on. One day she dies, in a large crowd of people, and instead of going to heaven she ends up in a world more bizarre and worst then hell could be. She'll meet vampire lords, a demon prince, and girls who seem to have double personalities while trying to escape and remember.
Shadowandthedragon: a girl and her friend Shadow find a dragon egg and go on an adventure with a group of friends.
Shadowars: In a world beyond the imagination of humans there are four kingdoms of suits locked in battle with one another. Will the Mellom treaty prevail? Or will the Hades alliance take their revenge? Watch as these great societies tear each other apart. Updates everyday, sometimes more.
Shadowassistantchronicles: In a universe where races struggle between war and peace, one race sits comfortably on top. Thus one man is commissioned as the Supreme Empress' faithful assistant. Xavier does Her Majesty's bidding as Her Master Assassin. Killing is his life and no task is too overwhelming. Except those days when he is ordered to follow the whims of Her High Princes to keep his cover. When not out to insure the supremacy of his race how is a Master Assassin supposed to relieve boredom? Sometimes being an assassin requires being a master of disguise. Updates every SUNDAY!!
Shadowfox: A deadly crime syndicate based on a newly awakened evil has plagued Goldenspark City. A mysterious purple-furred vigilante going by "Shadow Fox" catches the public's attention... and is to be killed at all costs.
Shadowgaiden: Mysterious men attacked the small village of Ralegold. Kimon, Rade and Kiro will form the shadow team and they will try to find and kill those men. A journey of mystery and action will begin!
Shadowofkunai: The Dark Hero of Tokyo prefecture Tenma island known as Kunai is consider a wanted fugitive by the police and international agencies but unknown to them he's Ryu Fugishima is the man under the mask. This half Japanese man who is adored by the people due to his ability to absorb failing businesses in Japan and abroad and converting them into overnight successes was a ruthless vigilante that the people feared. However he does this to protect the very citizens who rather see him in bars or worse. The only ones who know his true motive is his half demon Butler and his family comprising of his former cop wife and 10 year old daughter who thinks of Kunai should be consider a hero like her father is without the mask. Note: the updates aren't fixed and may or not update on different dates
ShadowofthePrimus: The Secundus are the inhuman creations of their centuries-gone masters, the Primus. Zyxus, a cursed, amnesiac Secundus, embarks on a great expedition to find the truth about the revered Primus, and finds more than anyone could have bargained for. Secundus are not furries. Updates Sundays. Thank you for letting me share this world with you. I am an ok writer, artist and storyteller, so I hope the three together make something enjoyable.
Shadowqueen: A comic about magic and fascism. A northern princess named Tatyana flees her starving city-state with her mentor Regina in order to find an ancient relic that will help her lead her people into the warmer southern lands before war and lack of food kill everyone.
Shadowrootacademy: Shadow-Root Academy Genre: Supernatural/Interdimensional Exiles Setting: Modern day Category: Action/Drama/Romance (hentai) Rating: NC-17 Theme: "Prep School for Monsters" Plot:For 300 years Shadow-Root Academy has been a training center for gifted men and women; it is also the home of the Crypto-Races, beings of ancient and modern mythology such as dragons, Giants, elves, aliens and others. Attending this school is Branwen Mac-balor, a young man tormented by nightmares, and harrassed by bullies. However, he discovers his true nature and calling to battle the forces of evil. Will he follow that call, or will he become the very threat he is training to fight against? Updates every tues and thurs.
ShadowsofMagic: Shadow Espada, half breed child of the wolf clan Espada deals with prejudice inside and out of her own family as she struggles to make her way through college and beginning her adult life. Magic, Mayhem and Shadows ensue.
ShadowsofSwordsandSorcery: The Adventures of One extremely dysfunctional adventuring Party. Based on our real adventures in The world of DnD 3.5
Shadowwatcher: Layla thought she was the only one who understood. But when Zye brought home her friends everything changed for the quiet, timid little artist and the voices inside her head.
Shadybrook: Three middle school friends flee from everyday life into adventures borne from their imaginations.
Shaked: Shaked (pronounced Shake-ed) is a little boy from the dark side of humanity--also called the bad guys' side. He's raised by two of the most powerful and sneeky guys in the world. One day, his two 'dads' need to go on another 'assignment' so they hire a 'babysitter' for the entire 3 days they'll be gone. The bad news is the 'good' guys have found their hideout and it's up to the 'babysitter'(Roth Error) to look after Shaked and make sure they don't capture him...because he holds all the secrets to his 'dads' escapes for the past 6 years...
Shakingoffsorcery: You think our world is boring and it could use some magic? And what if you lived in a world so full of magic... that you could actually get bored of it being everywhere? Check out the story of Tygon in the incredibly tiresome reality of dragons, magical spells and more...
Shakingoffsorcerypl: Wydaje Wam się, że nasz świat jest nudny i przydałaby się w nim odrobina magii? A gdybyście żyli w świecie tak pełnym magii... że mielibyście jej zwyczajnie po uszy? Oto historia Tygona, żyjącego w nieskończenie nużącym świecie smoków, zaklęć magicznych i tym podobnych...
ShamanQuest: A Nomad, a young runaway, a psychic on the verge of madness and other characters band together to reach New Babel, one of the last cities on Earth. On their way stands the Wastelands, huge desert filled with mad prophets, power-hunger mafias, bizarre creatures and the looming threat of a World-scale conspiracy...
Shamanchron: The Shaman Chronicles follows the story of Tsuya Keiyo, a young Shaman yet to realize his powers in a world plagued by evil spirits. Towards the end of his training, Tsuya and his friends Kenichi and Diana discover a mass grave of Shamans, and uncover a mystery that shakes the Shaman world to its core, spreading across the five continents: The Tundra, The Desert, The Mountains, The Forest and New Eden. And that's just his first semester.
Shameless: The story of a 14 year old girl who suddenly wakes up with the duty to create a region on a barren world known as Origen, alongside six other "Cosmos" that are alien in appearance. Join her as she faces the hardships of unrequited love, friendship, jealousy, and the inevitable...
Shapeup: "Shape Up" is the minimalist brainchild of Keyz Karanza. Contains explicit language.
Shaping: A shaped up webcomic about shapes!
SharkBuddinski: Shark Buddinski, a ferret born in the middle of a time of biological warfare where animals have mutated into beings of hyper aware state's of mind, is an innocent child longing for his mother. A simple child who dreams of being like his father and older brother and helping to bring the end of the war before the dreams begin... Dreams of himself, but older and younger at the same time. Will these dreams break him before the war does?
Sharkpunch: In the year 2120, the sharks rule the world. Everything has gone wrong. But there is still hope. A rebel agency known as the Shark Punching Insurgency, believe that they can overthrow the shark empire. Agents Victor, Jane, Miles, and Isaac have been sent to overthrow the Shark Empire, who are currently working on a secret plot to reshape the universe.
Sharpfangs: The land of the Sabertooth Tigers awaits you... what will happen?
Sharpner: I invented Baryy box head in my final A2 Graphics exam ( i had some spare time at the end ) and i needed to carry on his legacy, so here it is! with added characters inside!
ShatteredSkies: An anthromorphic fantasy with species at war. The great war has wound down to a stalemate and all the species have pulled their forces back. The elementals, the Foxcieans have returned their floating fortress while the earthen lords, the Jackals haven’t been seen for almost a hundred years. The wolven adults have disappeared leaving their home defended by children. Then there is the cats. They have sent the two most unlikely candidates to offer peace to their closest enemies – the Wolven.
Shatteredharmony: A random epic Sprite Comic Thingy!
Shatteredworldcomic: A young girl finds out she is more then what she seems and uncovers a truth older then time its self.[under development]
Shatterrealm: Iconoclasts clash as wanderers from parallel worlds fight for survival, meaning, and a way to get home. Through tehcnological or supernatural means, a random few have managed to move back and forth between worlds. Some are lost. Some are searching. Some are hunters and exterminators. An exploration of the human heart.
Shawbros: The Shaw-Chez Brothers are plumbers. They fight monsters and pop-culture icons. One toilet at a time.
Sheepless: An alcoholic bunny, his neurotic wife...and all the joys of stagnant marriage.
ShempsScribbles: More-or-less True Stories* from my life. Sometimes ridiculous things happen to me, so I make comics about them. Also, an exercise in finally learning how to draw myself in a recognizable way.
ShensOhm: When Shenhanh Yorotoshi stumbles upon the magic of the Albatross Stone, he realizes that he had been living in an isolated utopia his whole life. Only when he breaks out of the city does he learn about the current state of the world: chaotic, forlorn, and under the oppression of the tyrannical Max Almer. Upon seeing the suffering of those around him, Shenhanh decides to take matters into his own hands and bring peace to the world.
Sheriffsecret: Joe is sheriff of the town. He's brave, true, strong, and young, only sixteen years old! Quite an unusual sheriff, but not a better one could be asked for! But there's something that only select few people know about Joe... He's actually a she!
ShieldofJustice: An action story about a city that's ready to take crime off its streets, one criminal at a time
Shift: In an age where Gods still play an active role in citizens daily lives even while their people start to let magic fall behind; a young woman, Palia, is thrown into the turbulent waters of change to reaffirm Their necessity in a rapidly evolving world. Mounting scientific curiosities and discovery are leading people away from the old ways causing the weaker powered of the Heavenly set to disappear. Mortals of the world are becoming less conductive and magic is falling to a small few who are able to weld it with any effectiveness and keep its power from corrupting them. Should mortals be cut off from the heavens to keep from warring for power, Should the Gods step in to intervene or bow out and leave mortals in the dark? Can the scarifies needed for equilibrium be made for peace and continuation of the world or are they ultimately destined for destruction? Only Palia has the answers.
Shifter: Danny Philmore never had much going for him- he’s not very smart, or very talented, and he’s an awful dorky looking guy, to boot. But after drinking a rare potion, Danny was given the ability to transform himself into any person, animal, or object on Earth- opening his life to adventures as fantastic as his new ability
ShiftingRealities: The Half-Elf, Half-Demon known as Ranger has been captured and is imprisoned in the Void by the Dark God Abstrath. As his allies try to free him, the boundaries between reality and fantasy are inadvertently shattered, spilling objects, creatures and characters from one reality into the other. Now the world of Furia and our own are in serious jeopardy as Abstrath turns his dark gaze upon acquiring both as his own. Ranger and Gabriel are forced into constantly shifting realities in order to try and stop the Dark God's schemes spiralling to the ultimate showdown, with the unlikeliest allies imaginable.

Di wilayah gugusan nusantara, amalan keras dan mistik telah menjadi dogma yang merentas sempadan budaya. Mereka yang mengejar cahaya di langit dalam khilaf tergelincir ke gelap lautan. Songforthelost: Ever since the creation of their kind, wolves have been separated. According to old legends, it all started when the creators separated the pure from the wicked. The 'pure souls' and the 'corrupted souls' were soon recognized by their eye color. Most were various shades of red and blue; but others, who were considered neutral, were gray. War eventually broke out between the two main sides. The war was long, but eventually the two sides grew weary. Conflict still occurred, but serious fights were few and far in between. Around the same time, the gods were having their own problems. Seven of the gods were forced to banish one of their own, Tor, who only sought power rather than peace. After the war ended, the gods created the messenger wolves to ensure that there would be no more wars. Messengers are wolves that are born with unique markings, and serve a specific god or goddess. Two hundred years later is where our story takes place. When it appears that Tor is causing trouble in the mortal world, one wolf is forced to carry a terrible burden.

Stanmarley: Okay, so long story short, I wanted to make a radio show after listening to some Sirius XM Radio Classics. I started the idea somewhere in 2009, but it didn't get off the ground until just now. Finally, after a lot of work and help from some REALLY AWESOME people, my vision is coming to life! Of course, this is the first time I've done anything like this, so consider it trial and error. We'll get better as we go along and find out what works and what don't work. Bear with us please! Currently this is the first and only case. Will Stan have more cases after this one is solved? We're not sure. It depends on how much of a hassle this becomes, and how much of a following it gets. Until then, stick along for the ride.

Thegreatadventurer: As our pen leaves the paper, an idea is juxtaposed on innocent line. A circle becomes a face, a cross becomes arms. This “stickman” lives by our gift of life, human intelligence (or lack of), and truth. They live in the 2nd dimension, and they, though simple and admittedly crudely drawn, lived lives like ours. I present to you the story of Leif E. Greens, a person that hopefully you can see more likeness than just the two lines representing eyes, or the curve representing a smile. In truth, like most adventurers, he finally realized that the world was much, much, much bigger than him. He wasn’t bigger than life or possessed of great powers, but his story is a story that deserves telling. He fought pirates, crossed jungles, dived to the depths of the ocean, went through space, and was almost as cool as S. McDuck, but that is not why his story is worth telling. Because we can only understand a tiny fraction of a universe that is bigger than our sight is limited, I leave you with one short story that can hopefully tell you a lot. But not too much. Being the post-autobiography of the Great Adventurer and part time kazoo player Leif E. Greens. Edited by Colton Johnson.

It really is a great day to live on our Earth.”-New York Times 2040: “It was announced today that guns will now be considered illegal. Everyone who owns firearms must turn them into the authorities by eight o'clock tonight or face criminal charges. After today gun ownership will be considered attempted murder and will be tried justly."-Every local news station 2400: "I went out to the ridge this morning holding daddy's gun. It didn't have any bullets, and was rusted shut, but it was more of the meaning. This new peaceful world we created must be continued. Now that dad has passed away, I can finally destroy the last remnants of our awful past. So, I tossed it in the sea."-Emma Love's journal age 27 2613: “Today it has been confirmed by the worlds association of scientists, that we are indeed heading into an ice age. The power council is convening as I type to discover a solution.”-New York Times 2617: “We ate our last piece of bread last night. It was moldy, but it filled that pit in my stomach. The government says they will be sending more food, but I can not imagine how. Half the planet is starving because of this damned ice age. I fear the hunger will soon take ma'ma”-Corey Samson age 16 2623: "I heard the sirens today that mommy said mean trouble. I was in my room when daddy came got me. He said we all had to go to the square to see what was happening. We watched a man talking on the big TV . I didn't understand most of his words, so mommy explained that we were in a war. I still didn't understand, but mommy and daddy were crying so I didn't want to bother them. It must be something bad."-Ratchel age 12 2625: “I've been working so hard these last years, and it's finally come to fruition! He awoke last night, confused, but willing. He is so strong! Stronger than any normal being I am sure! The tests of his reflexes also show a marked 200% improvement from a normal human. The officer called to confirm and ordered twenty thousand. He also suggested something I had never thought of before, mixing in animal DNA to create special forms of my soldiers. Magnificent, I'll begin production tomorrow.”-Doctor Killinger age 46 3700: "That's it ladies and gentlemen, the war is over. Today at 9 A.M. standard the leaders signed a peace treaty, ending the longest war of human history. A war that has killed far too many loved ones, and left us wondering why we, as a people, have done this."-local news 3750: “After so many years of slavery to these unfit beings, we are going to be free! The commander promised that within a week all my brothers and sisters will be broken of their bonds. These pathetic humans, thinking they can control us! But I try not to worry, because I know they will pay, dearly.” Subject 543 3800: We were shoved into a truck with all of the rest of our neighbors. I was scared, but relieved to be leaving the concentration camp. They treated us well, but we were never free. Mom said they were taking us to the other side of the country, to the wastes. It took so long to get to the waste wall, but we could see it hours before we got there. It is massive, mounds of thrash piled up through the clouds. It had nearly been completed except for one opening that the thousands of us were forced through. I was scared, but mom said we would soon be free on our own side of the world.” Lisa Robinson age 14 3993: Present
